sys_ux_client_script.name: Show Submit Comment Alert

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_c1e81fb984c642108710a904f404a2b4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c9e81fb943c6421009ecb955c03ccdb8</macroponent><name>Show Submit Comment Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    {
        "message": "Comment posted."
    }
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "submitCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: await helpers.translate("Comment posted."),
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 16:50:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>c1e81fb984c642108710a904f404a2b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Submit Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c1e81fb984c642108710a904f404a2b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 16:50:17</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
